availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Jefferson County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Married to Mary Williams. Father of Louis Williams and Mary Williams. Farmer in Jefferson County in 1860. Owned one enslaved person in 1860.

ab.bibl: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District No. 1, p. 133; Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Slave Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, District No. 1, p. 11; Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Jefferson County, Spring Garden Precinct, p. 7; KYR-0001-029-0551; KYR-0001-004-0166.
